b01f9b9c-2203-475d-b5ea-f22ef13195ac.question: How will an applicant receive their Zoom link for the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
b01f9b9c-2203-475d-b5ea-f22ef13195ac.answer: Applicants will receive their personal Zoom link at least 12 hours in advance to their interview.

d6a47d21-f8ad-4c7b-996b-52a20afff90b.question: How relevant is proficiency in German for succeeding in the Master’s program and securing job opportunities related to the field? Also, does TUM offer German language courses as an extracurricular option included in the Master's program fees?
d6a47d21-f8ad-4c7b-996b-52a20afff90b.answer: German language is not required for our Master’s program, as all modules are taught in English. But, of course, some knowledge of German will make life here easier for you. Please feel free to check out TUM’s language center: https://www.sprachenzentrum.tum.de/en/sz/homepage/

fbab7791-6c19-4ca3-beed-f8b5ccb3e21c.question: What are the broad range of topics covered in the TUM entrance aptitude test for AI in Society?
fbab7791-6c19-4ca3-beed-f8b5ccb3e21c.answer: The test covers a broad range of topics including Politics and [REDACTED], Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, and Engineering and [REDACTED].

d67eb2ee-7dc2-4e13-85e2-15dd1efd3e55.question: What topics will be covered in the aptitude test for the Master's programme 'AI in Society' at TUM?
d67eb2ee-7dc2-4e13-85e2-15dd1efd3e55.answer: The topics covered by the test can be found on the TUM website at https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/

a06c1e94-8d24-47dc-a849-624d1b36c2a6.question: In my case, where I am currently studying a Master's degree at TUM and have two bachelor's degrees in Mechatronics, is the application for AI for Society considered as 'Consecutive masters courses' or 'Second degree'?
a06c1e94-8d24-47dc-a849-624d1b36c2a6.answer: In this case, you should choose 'Second degree', as it would be your second Master’s degree.

ecaf1a9c-b4a3-405c-93c4-d0b6ce15e86e.question: Can a bachelor's thesis written in English be considered as proof of English proficiency?
ecaf1a9c-b4a3-405c-93c4-d0b6ce15e86e.answer: Yes, a bachelor's thesis written in English can be accepted as proof of English proficiency.

62d4722e-7a51-44ad-a24a-8b7229a390d7.question: What should be provided for projects outside of university, such as internships or work experience, in the application?
62d4722e-7a51-44ad-a24a-8b7229a390d7.answer: For projects outside of university, such as internships or work experience, please provide a work certificate or similar, stating a) the contents of your work, and b) the duration of your work. Otherwise, we cannot verify this experience.

7c9c8fd9-82d8-4733-9c93-455d3a810a2c.question: What should applicants do if they have already received an invitation to the aptitude test for the AI in Society program at TUM?
7c9c8fd9-82d8-4733-9c93-455d3a810a2c.answer: If applicants have already received an invitation to the test, they should ignore the email about the second test date. For them, the test is still being held on the originally scheduled date.
